https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ncDTgOmdxWUgK02VGf6umgaCiQx.jpg Boku Otaryman (I, Otaku Salaryman) is a fun little 35-minute ditty about a Japanese Salaryman and his somewhat otaku tendencies. Originally based off of a 4koma, the anime is about a likable and rather silly salaryman named Yoshitani. Boku, Otaryman.
